EmailTemplate.name: Additional Information required
EmailTemplate.subject: Inquiry for DuPont Corian
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your inquiry. We value your inquiry and we are doing our best to ensure that your inquiry receives our full attention. In order for us to best direct your inquiry to one of our experts, we will need additional information about:
1) What particular product or service are you looking for? (Please provide DuPont brand name if known)
2) How is the material going to be used?
3) The quantity youâ€™re looking to use for this type of product?
4) How did you hear about DuPont?
5) Contact Details (Mobile number / Address)?
We thank you for your interest in DuPont and we hope to hear from you soon.
You can also check on our website for the product availability at DuPont.
(http://www.dupont.com/)
Sincerely,
DuPont Inquiry Management Center AP
